messages.speech:
Use http://help.outlook.com/en-us/140/dd936215.aspx from the device to open the installation Wizard.

When the Wizard opens, first choose your phone's operating system.
Wizard will ask you "What would you like to do?" Choose "Set Up Microsoft Exchange email on an "xxx device" (depending on which OS you chose in Step 1).
Instructions for how to sync your Century student email account to your device will open. Follow the instructions, using the information below.

    Domain/username is your Century email address
    The password is your StarID password
    For Exchange server, type: outlook.office365.com

For more information about the student email, please check out this video: https://mediaspace.minnstate.edu/media/Student+Videos+-+Email.mp4/0_i3sfnuirw
